topic.title: Restore Local Backups
topic.shortdesc: When a data error a data loss occurs in your system, you can restore local backups for the whole YMP system or for a specific PBX via Web GUI.

section.title: Recover a customer's PBX
section.p: When your customer's PBX data is abnormal or the PBX data is lost, you can quickly restore an individual PBX backup for the customer's PBX.

ol.li: Log in the YMP web interface, go to PBX, select the customer's PBX, click .

On the PBX settings page, click Restore, select a backup file, click .
The name of the backup file contains the name of the YMP backup file and the PBX firmware version.
Click Confirm to restore the backup.

section.title: Recover the YMP system
section.p: When the data loss or data error occurs in the YMP system or in all the customers' PBXs, you can restore the entire YMP backup to fix this issue.

ol.li: Log in the YMP web interface, go to Maintenance Backup & Restore .
Click Confirm to restore the backup.
